com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol

Class SmcProvider.SearchCriteria

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol.SmcProvider.SearchCriteria
  • Enclosing interface:
    SmcProvider

    public static class SmcProvider.SearchCriteria
extends Object
    This class contains the search criteria used in the search method.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a SearchCriteria instance with the specified keyword.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SmcProvider.SearchCriteria

        public SmcProvider.SearchCriteria(String keyword)
        Creates a SearchCriteria instance with the specified keyword.

        You can use the keyword to match title, artist, and album information. If the keyword is an empty string, all content matches the criteria.

        Parameters:
        keyword - The keyword you want to use as a search criteria.

    • Method Detail

      • getKeyword

        public String getKeyword()
        Get the keyword.
        Returns:
        The keyword currently in the search criteria.

      • equals

        public boolean equals(Object o)
        Check if the specified object is the same as the current SearchCriteria object.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Returns:
        • true - if the two objects are equal.
        • false - if the two objects are not equal.

      • isMatchedItemType

        public boolean isMatchedItemType(int type)
        Check if the specified media type matches the value set for the current SearchCriteria instance.
        Parameters:
        type - The media type. The valid values are:
        • SmcItem.MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_AUDIO
        • SmcItem.MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_FOLDER
        • SmcItem.MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_IMAGE
        • SmcItem.MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_VIDEO
        Returns:
        • true - if the specified media type matches the current SearchCriteria instance.
        • false - if the specified media type does not match the current SearchCriteria instance.

      • addItemType

        public SmcProvider.SearchCriteria addItemType(Integer type)
        Add the specified media type to the search criteria.

        If the specified media type is invalid, then no media type is added to the SmcProvider.SearchCriteria instance.

        Parameters:
        type - The media type. The valid values are:
        • SmcItem.MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_AUDIO
        • SmcItem.MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_FOLDER
        • SmcItem.MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_IMAGE
        • SmcItem.MEDIA_TYPE_ITEM_VIDEO
        Returns:
        The SmcProvider.SearchCriteria instance.
